START.name: the front of a large building
START.desc: There is a mysterious man out front saying handing out flyers and you decide to take one
START.up: Upon closer inspection, the building appears to be five stories tall but has no windows and a sign above saying ' '.

F1.name: First Floor
F1.desc: You enter to see a long hallway. The walls a draped with curtains.

items.desc: At the other end you see a lone bookshelf
items.inspect: You can see light comming from under the bookshelf

F2.name: Secound Floor
F2.desc:
You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here,
and all the windows are barred.

F4.name: Fourth Floor
F4.desc: You enter a stange room where on the only thing that seems to be in it is a ceiling fan attached to floor
F4.up: You look up and find a bed attched to the ceiling, along with a table, and some chairs.

F5.name: Fifth Flooth
F5.desc: You enter what apears to be a normal bed room. There is bed, a small cupboard, a TV mounted on the wall, and a door that looks to lead into a closet
F5.up: There is just a regular ceiling fan.

items.desc: An ornately carved sword is displayed on the wall.
items.take: You take the sword from the wall. It glows slightly in your hand.

ELVT.name: Elevator
ELVT.desc: The elevator has buttons for floors 1 through 5, there is a hole where the sixth button should be.
ELVT.up: Above the door so see in writing '14531325'
